requirement_43.text:
ABC Global Retail Enterprise - AI BI Platform PRD
Product Requirements Document (PRD)
Product Name:  Persona-Based AI for BI Platform
Company:  ABC Global Retail Enterprise
Document Owner:  [Your Name / Product Manager]
Date:  2025-12-08
Version:  1.0 
1. Executive Summary
ABC,  a  global  retail  enterprise  operating  across  North  America,  Europe,  and  Asia,  has  deployed  a
persona-based AI for BI platform. The platform delivers conversational analytics, proactive insights,
and  prescriptive  recommendations .  It  leverages  a  multi-agent  orchestration  framework  and
provides role-based dashboards for various personas.
2. Goals & Objectives
Enable conversational analytics  for natural language queries.
Deliver proactive insights  with anomaly detection and narrative explanations.
Provide prescriptive recommendations  and scenario simulations.
Support persona-based access  for relevant KPIs, insights, and recommendations.
Improve testing efficiency through automation of multi-agent orchestration, dashboard KPIs,
insights, and RBAC.
3. Platform Architecture
3.1 Multi-Agent Orchestration Framework
Agent Responsibility
Router Agent Understands user intent and routes queries.
KPI Agent Fetches KPI definitions and metrics from the semantic layer .
Diagnostic Agent Performs root cause analysis when KPIs deviate.
Simulation Agent Runs "what-if" and forecasting scenarios.
Clarification Agent Requests missing parameters for ambiguous queries.
Continuity Agent Maintains session context via Redis memory.• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
1
3.2 User-Facing Components
Component Description
Home Screen (KPI Visuals)Standardized dashboards displaying critical KPIs (sales,
margin, inventory, NPS).
Insights Screen (Pre-Generated
Insights)AI-pushed narratives and anomaly alerts.
Persona AccessRole-based dashboards and insights for RMs, Store Managers,
CROs, ELT.
4. Current Challenges
Conversational Queries : Manual QA scripts; limited coverage for ambiguous queries.
Multi-Agent Orchestration : Manual tracing; edge cases largely untested.
Home Screen KPIs : Manual validation against SQL; regression packs of 50–100 KPIs.
Insights Screen : Spot-checked; false positives/negatives often missed.
Persona Testing : Manual login; RBAC checked against static lists.
Performance & Load Testing : Synthetic traffic generators; limited session continuity and Redis
validation.
5. Product Requirements
5.1 Functional Requirements
Conversational Analytics : Support natural language queries; provide clarification prompts.
Multi-Agent Orchestration : Ensure seamless agent flow; enable logging and traceability.
Dashboard KPIs : Real-time standardized KPIs with drill-down.
Pre-Generated Insights : Automatic narrative generation; confidence scoring.
Persona-Based Access : RBAC for RMs, Store Managers, CROs, ELT; persona-specific dashboards.
Performance & Scalability : Handle concurrent sessions; ensure Redis memory scales.
5.2 Non-Functional Requirements
Reliability:  99.9% uptime.
Security:  Enterprise-grade authentication and authorization.
Usability:  Intuitive interface and clear visualizations.
Testability:  Automated testing framework.
Maintainability:  Modular design for agent enhancements.
6. Testing Requirements
Conversational Queries:  Automated validation and edge-case coverage.
Multi-Agent Orchestration:  Automated flow tracing and logging.
Dashboard KPIs:  Regression packs and semantic layer validation.1.

Insights:  Automated anomaly and narrative testing.
Persona Testing:  Automated RBAC and persona-specific validation.
Performance & Load:  High concurrency simulation and Redis stress testing.
7. Dependencies
Semantic layer for KPI definitions and metrics.
Redis for session continuity.
Synthetic data for anomaly testing.
Role definitions for RBAC.
8. Future Enhancements
Expand predictive and prescriptive agent capabilities.
Integrate external data sources for forecasting.
Multi-language conversational support.
Continuous learning from user interactions.
9. Appendix
Abbreviations:  - KPI – Key Performance Indicator - BI – Business Intelligence - RM – Relationship
Manager - CRO – Chief Revenue Officer - ELT – Executive Leadership Team4.
